Summary: I saw a bright object comming from the N-E, very bright went right over Patterson, CA 95363. Traveled S-E at a angle, no blinking lights or noise. I flashed my flash lite at it but no response. Lasted approx 25 to 30 secounds, it look low in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my back yard looking at the stars, I do that mostly on a clear night, this time there was a full moon, but I still went out to look around. That is when I saw a bright object comming from the N-W, and it seem to go right over Patterson CA. at a angle to the S-E. It had no blinking lights on it and it was at least 2 times as bright as any star in the sky. As it went over head I flashed my flash light at it but I didn't get any response, I would not have flashed my light at it if it had blinking lights on it, also there was no noise at all comming from the object. I saw a object like this befor and they said it was Sky Lab? I look at my phone and it was 9:02 p.m. so if it was Sky Lab that should help. The object didn't make any weird moves or speed up or slow down any, and I think alot of people could have seen this object even with the full moon. On question #3, I didn't think it was a plane, I don't know why.#4 it was very bright and only one color, didn't make any quick moves.#5 I thought it would flash back when I flashed my lite at it but it didn't, and hope it wasen't Sky Lab.#6 It just went out of view.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Modesto
There were no other sightings in Modesto on or around April 24th 2013
